trans-unit.source: Put Message
trans-unit.target: Put Message

trans-unit.source: Put Message
trans-unit.target: Put Message

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation adds a new message to the back of the message queue.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation adds a new message to the back of the message queue.

trans-unit.source: A visibility timeout can also be specified to make the message invisible until the visibility timeout expires.
trans-unit.target: A visibility timeout can also be specified to make the message invisible until the visibility timeout expires.

trans-unit.source: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding.

trans-unit.source: The encoded message can be up to 64 KB in size for versions 2011-08-18 and newer, or 8 KB in size for previous versions.
trans-unit.target: The encoded message can be up to 64 KB in size for versions 2011-08-18 and newer, or 8 KB in size for previous versions.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Put Message</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, and <parameterReference>myqueue</parameterReference> with the name of your queue:
trans-unit.target: Replace <placeholder>myaccount</placeholder> with the name of your storage account, and <parameterReference>myqueue</parameterReference> with the name of your queue:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Emulated Storage Service
trans-unit.target: Emulated Storage Service

trans-unit.source: This operation and the optional <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter are supported for SDK 1.6 and newer versions.
trans-unit.target: This operation and the optional <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter are supported for SDK 1.6 and newer versions.

trans-unit.source: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Queue service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10001</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:
trans-unit.target: When making a request against the emulated storage service, specify the emulator hostname and Queue service port as <codeInline>127.0.0.1:10001</codeInline>, followed by the emulated storage account name:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: If specified, the request must be made using an <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> of 2011-08-18 or newer.
trans-unit.target: If specified, the request must be made using an <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> of 2011-08-18 or newer.

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: If not specified, the default value is 0.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new visibility timeout value, in seconds, relative to server time.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the new visibility timeout value, in seconds, relative to server time.

trans-unit.source: The new value must be larger than or equal to 0, and cannot be larger than 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The new value must be larger than or equal to 0, and cannot be larger than 7 days.

trans-unit.source: The visibility timeout of a message cannot be set to a value later than the expiry time.
trans-unit.target: The visibility timeout of a message cannot be set to a value later than the expiry time.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> should be set to a value smaller than the time-to-live value.
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> should be set to a value smaller than the time-to-live value.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time-to-live interval for the message, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the time-to-live interval for the message, in seconds.

trans-unit.source: The maximum time-to-live allowed is 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The maximum time-to-live allowed is 7 days.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is omitted, the default time-to-live is 7 days.
trans-unit.target: If this parameter is omitted, the default time-to-live is 7 days.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>timeout</parameterReference> parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="59e840ea-62da-4e1c-9cc2-8a70e919594e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Queue Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="59e840ea-62da-4e1c-9cc2-8a70e919594e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for Queue Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit that is recorded in the analytics logs when storage analytics logging is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="1727932c-8a3b-4502-86ac-c89931d54bac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">About Storage Analytics Logging</link> and <externalLink><linkText>Azure Logging: Using Logs to Track Storage Requests</linkText><linkUri>http://blogs.msdn.com/b/windowsazurestorage/archive/2011/08/03/windows-azure-storage-logging-using-logs-to-track-storage-requests.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The body of the request contains the message data in the following XML format.
trans-unit.target: The body of the request contains the message data in the following XML format.

trans-unit.source: Note that the message content must be in a format that may be encoded with UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: Note that the message content must be in a format that may be encoded with UTF-8.

trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).

trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Queue service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Queue service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.
trans-unit.target: This header is returned for requests made against version 2009-09-19 and later.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: This operation can be performed by the account owner and by anyone with a shared access signature that has permission to perform this operation.

trans-unit.source: The optional visibility timeout specifies the time that the message will be invisible.
trans-unit.target: The optional visibility timeout specifies the time that the message will be invisible.

trans-unit.source: After the timeout expires, the message will become visible.
trans-unit.target: After the timeout expires, the message will become visible.

trans-unit.source: If a visibility timeout is not specified, the default value of 0 is used.
trans-unit.target: If a visibility timeout is not specified, the default value of 0 is used.

trans-unit.source: The optional message time-to-live specifies how long a message will remain in the queue.
trans-unit.target: The optional message time-to-live specifies how long a message will remain in the queue.

trans-unit.source: The message will be deleted from the queue when the time-to-live period expires.
trans-unit.target: The message will be deleted from the queue when the time-to-live period expires.

trans-unit.source: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding.
trans-unit.target: A message must be in a format that can be included in an XML request with UTF-8 encoding.

trans-unit.source: To include markup in the message, the contents of the message must either be XML-escaped or Base64-encode.
trans-unit.target: To include markup in the message, the contents of the message must either be XML-escaped or Base64-encode.

trans-unit.source: Any XML markup in the message that is not escaped or encoded will be removed before the message is added to the queue.
trans-unit.target: Any XML markup in the message that is not escaped or encoded will be removed before the message is added to the queue.

trans-unit.source: If the message is too large, the service returns status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: If the message is too large, the service returns status code 400 (Bad Request).
